tasks.task: Design the layout of the website
Implement an input field where users can input data
Create client-side form validation to prevent entries of invalid data
Create a system to receive and process the data from the form
Implement a function that performs a specific task with the input data according to the website's functions
Set up communication pathways to send the processed data back to the frontend or to communicate it to the database
Design a database schema that reflects the data to be stored
Set up the database (table creation, procedures, etc.) according to the schema
Implement ways to write to and read from the database, taking into account the processed data from the backend
